entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 4 cm over northern sections. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
